POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tse.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateCloudNativeAPIGateway
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Name": "gateway-prod",
    "Type": "kong",
    "GatewayVersion": "2.5.1",
    "NodeConfig": {
        "Specification": "1c2g",
        "Number": 2
    },
    "VpcConfig": {
        "VpcId": "vpc-59cag821",
        "SubnetId": "subnet-8tzp8uz1"
    },
    "Description": "公网入口网关，现网环境",
    "Tags": [
        {
            "TagKey": "env",
            "TagValue": "prod"
        }
    ],
    "EnableCls": false,
    "FeatureVersion": "STANDARD",
    "InternetMaxBandwidthOut": 1,
    "EngineRegion": "ap-guangzhou",
    "IngressClassName": "kong",
    "TradeType": 0,
    "InternetConfig": {
        "InternetAddressVersion": "IPV4",
        "InternetPayMode": "TRAFFIC",
        "InternetMaxBandwidthOut": 1,
        "Description": "公网负载均衡",
        "SlaType": "clb.c2.medium",
        "MultiZoneFlag": true,
        "MasterZoneId": "ap-guangzhou-3",
        "SlaveZoneId": "ap-guangzhou-4"
    }
}
